member.name: T:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.PartnerCredentials
member.summary: Use this class to generate Partner Center API credentials. User plus application based authentication and application only authentication are supported.

member.summary: A singleton instance of the partner credentials.

member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.PartnerCredentials.Instance
member.summary: Gets an instance of the partner credentials.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.PartnerCredentials.GenerateByApplicationCredentials(System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.RequestContext.IRequestContext)
member.summary: Generates partner credentials using azure active directory application credentials.
member.param: The client id of the application in azure active directory. This application should be an Azure web application.
The application secret with azure active directory.
The application domain in Azure Active Directory.
An optional request context.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.PartnerCredentials.GenerateByApplicationCredentialsAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.RequestContext.IRequestContext)
member.summary: Asynchronously generates partner credentials using azure active directory application credentials.
member.param: The client id of the application in azure active directory. This application should be an Azure web application.
The application secret with azure active directory.
The application domain in Azure Active Directory.
An optional request context.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.PartnerCredentials.GenerateByUserCredentials(System.String,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.AuthenticationToken,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.TokenRefresher,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.RequestContext.IRequestContext)
member.summary: Generates partner credentials using a user plus application azure active directory token.
member.param: The client id of the application in azure active directory. This application should be an Azure native application.
The azure active directory token.

An optional delegate which will be called when the azure active directory token expires and can no longer be used to generate the partner credentials. This delegate should return an up to date azure active directory token.
An optional request context.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.PartnerCredentials.GenerateByUserCredentialsAsync(System.String,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.AuthenticationToken,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.TokenRefresher,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.RequestContext.IRequestContext)
member.summary: Asynchronously generates partner credentials using a user plus application azure active directory token.
member.param: The client id of the application in azure active directory. This application should be an Azure native application.
The azure active directory token.

An optional delegate which will be called when the azure active directory token expires and can no longer be used to generate the partner credentials. This delegate should return an up to date azure active directory token.
An optional request context.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.PartnerCredentials.GenerateByApplicationCredentials(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.RequestContext.IRequestContext)
member.summary: Generates partner credentials using azure active directory application credentials with the provided AAD overrides.
member.param: The client id of the application in azure active directory. This application should be an Azure web application.
The application secret with azure active directory.
The application domain in Azure Active Directory.
The active directory authority endpoint.
The AAD graph API endpoint.
An optional request context.

member.summary: Asynchronously generates partner credentials using azure active directory application credentials with the provided AAD overrides.

An optional request context.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.TokenRefresher
member.summary: Defines a delegate used to retrieve updated tokens.
member.param: The authentication token which has expired.
member.returns: A delegate used to retrieve updated tokens.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Extensions.UserPartnerCredentials
member.summary: Partner service credentials based on azure active directory user credentials.

member.summary: The delegate used to refresh the azure active directory token.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
